import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, Button, Row, Col, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { login } from '../actions/userActions' const LoginScreen = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const location = useLocation() const redirect = location.search ? location.search.split('=')[1] : '/' const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() // DISPATCH LOGIN } return

Sign In

Email Address setEmail(e.target.value)} > Password setPassword(e.target.value)} >
New Customer? Register } export default LoginScreen
